name: cb-oralhistory-the-annotated-media-version-data
title: cb-oralhistory — the "annotated media" version Data
description: Metadata and data derived from cb-oralhistory — the "annotated media" version. CB-Oralhistory is a mix of CollectionBuilder-CSV and Oral History as Data (OHD), with the option to inlude time-coded descriptive metadata.

contributors.title: Center for Digital Inquiry and Learning (CDIL)
